text:
Nia Sharma's 8 pictures that prove she is TV's party animal 
After bagging the third spot in the list of Top 50 Sexiest Asian Women in the world, popular TV actress Nia Sharma is yet again making news but, this time for a rather ugly reason. The petite actress posted a sexy video of herself on her Instagram account and received huge backlash from netizens . While some called her a slut, some suggested her to become a porn star. But not of the kinds to be affected by all the hatred, former Jamai Raja actress shut them up by posting another video! Check it out what she had to say- A video posted by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) on Jan 29, 2017 at 10:18am PST 
A video posted by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) on Jan 31, 2017 at 6:27am PST 
Amidst all the hullabaloo, the attention drifted away from the video that she is going to feature in. Nia is making her music video debut with Tony Kakkar’s new single Waada, which is releasing on 4th Feb. Speaking about the song, Nia said in an interview with Indian Express, “It’s truly a fresh venture for me, away from a daily soap, and honestly I have always loved music videos personally and it didn’t take more than five minutes to say yes to it when i was approached for this one. Tony’s song is so pure and blissful and he is such a sweetheart. It was fun working with him. The video has been shot beautifully. I saw the rushes.” She said that she is game for more such singles, and in fact harbours a dream to feature in an English music video. 
Here is a sneak peek into the video – A photo posted by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) on Jan 31, 2017 at 3:49am PST 
A photo posted by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) on Jan 13, 2017 at 2:11am PST A photo posted by Photuwala’S (@photuwalas) on Jan 13, 2017 at 2:31am PST 
A photo posted by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) on Jan 2, 2017 at 4:10am PST A photo posted by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) on Dec 28, 2016 at 11:26am PST 
Apart from the music video, Nia Sharma will also be seen in Vikram Bhatt’s webseries Twisted. The actress always wanted to venture into the digital platform and had also once said that she wanted to explore the medium fully. Here is the poster. 
A photo posted by Namit khanna (@namitkhanna_official) on Jan 28, 2017 at 3:15am PST 
Nia has been away from television for quite some time now. She was last seen on Comedy Nights Bachao Taaza and Zee TV’s Jamai Raja.
